properties.name: doublechain.idgen.snowflake.data-center
properties.description: Specify the data center id which is the snowflake used to generate id

properties.name: doublechain.idgen.snowflake.group
properties.description: Group is used to separate with different id center group, sometimes it can be the project name

properties.name: doublechain.idgen.snowflake.ignite.join-timeout
properties.description: The timeout ms which the node join the cluster. Join timeout 0 means wait forever

properties.name: doublechain.idgen.snowflake.ignite.discovery-type
properties.description: The node discovery type in cluster

properties.name: doublechain.idgen.snowflake.ignite.multicast.group-ip
properties.description: The IP address of multicast group

properties.name: doublechain.idgen.snowflake.ignite.multicast.multicast-port
properties.description: The port number which multicast messages are sent to.

properties.name: doublechain.idgen.snowflake.ignite.multicast.local-address
properties.description: The local host IP address that discovery SPI uses. If not provided, by default a first found non-loopback address will be used. If there is no non-loopback address available, then InetAddress.getLocalHost() will be used.

properties.name: doublechain.idgen.snowflake.ignite.multicast.local-port
properties.description: The local port to listen to

properties.name: doublechain.idgen.snowflake.ignite.multicast.local-port-range
properties.description: Range for local ports. Local node will try to bind on first available port starting from local-port up until (local-port + local-port-range). If port range value is 0, then application will try bind only to the local-port and fail if binding to this port did not succeed.
